程序包 org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server

Server-side specific implementation classes.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Constants
    Internal implementation constants.
    DefaultServerEndpointConfigurator  
    TestAsyncMessages  
    TestClassLoader
    Tests endpoint methods are called with the correct class loader.
    TestClassLoader.ClassLoaderEndpoint  
    TestClassLoader.Client  
    TestClassLoader.Config  
    TestClose
    Test the behavior of closing websockets under various conditions.
    TestClose.BaseEndpointConfig  
    TestClose.Events  
    TestClose.TestEndpoint  
    TestClose.TestEndpointConfig  
    TestCloseBug58624  
    TestCloseBug58624.Bug58624ServerConfig  
    TestCloseBug58624.Bug58624ServerEndpoint  
    TesterEndpointConfig  
    TesterWsCloseClient
    A client for testing Websocket behavior that differs from standard client behavior.
    TestShutdown
    Tests inspired by https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?
    TestShutdown.EchoBufferedConfig  
    TestShutdown.EchoBufferedEndpoint  
    TestUriTemplate  
    TestWsRemoteEndpointImplServer  
    TestWsRemoteEndpointImplServer.Bug58624Config  
    TestWsRemoteEndpointImplServer.Bug58624Encoder  
    TestWsRemoteEndpointImplServer.Bug58624Endpoint  
    TestWsRemoteEndpointImplServer.Bug58624SendMessage  
    TestWsServerContainer  
    TestWsServerContainer.Bug54807Config  
    UpgradeUtil  
    UriTemplate
    Extracts path parameters from URIs used to create web socket connections using the URI template defined for the associated Endpoint.
    WsContextListener
    In normal usage, this ServletContextListener does not need to be explicitly configured as the WsSci performs all the necessary bootstrap and installs this listener in the ServletContext.
    WsFilter
    Handles the initial HTTP connection for WebSocket connections.
    WsFrameServer  
    WsHandshakeRequest
    Represents the request that this session was opened under.
    WsHttpUpgradeHandler
    Servlet 3.1 HTTP upgrade handler for WebSocket connections.
    WsRemoteEndpointImplServer
    This is the server side RemoteEndpoint implementation - i.e. what the server uses to send data to the client.
    WsSci
    Registers an interest in any class that is annotated with ServerEndpoint so that Endpoint can be published via the WebSocket server.
    WsServerContainer
    Provides a per class loader (i.e. per web application) instance of a ServerContainer.
    WsSessionListener  
    WsWriteTimeout
    Provides timeouts for asynchronous web socket writes.

程序包org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server的说明

Server-side specific implementation classes. These are in a separate package to make packaging a pure client JAR simpler.
